attributes.action: Use all his power and influence to stop the illegal israeli settlements in east jeruselam and all the terrorities taken in the 1967 war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cHskDlXHSx4    please watch this documentary made by Al-Jazeera it'll  enlighten you about just a snippet of what the Israelis are doing to the Palestinean. I know you have already expressed your concern however if false intelligence is enough to attack Iraq then surely this demands more than just condemnation!
